scenario_text.value: I have to...protect my sister... I have to...

You little punk! Kaito, don’t listen to him!
That’s not really how you feel!
No, Dracumon. That is how I feel.

You’re right. I’ll do whatever it takes to
protect Miu.

But so what?! I’m her brother, of course I’m
gonna look out for her!

And here’s the thing, you stupid phony. She’s
not so weak she can’t do anything herself!

If you forget that and get overprotective,
then you’re really in for it!

Heh, now that’s what I’m talking about!
You’re a real piece of work, Kaito.
Oh, shut up! Let’s do this already!
